Description: Up today we have a killer B.C Rich Special Edition Mockingbird. These were only made for a short time and are no longer being made. Guitar plays and sounds great. Would look amazing under the stage lights! For more info, please review the condition description and pics. Have any questions, feel free to ask! :) Please ask any and all questions, prior to purchasing. **Sold as is, no returns** item has been described accurately. No case or bag, but will be packaged extremely well for safe shipping. With proper shipping materials. Ships insured with tracking and signature confirmation. Please do not agree to buy if you do not plan to pay.
Title: B.C. Rich Mockingbird Special Edition Evil Edge 6 String Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: In good used condition. Does have some various touch up points. One the on the back of the cutaway point, one on the back of the guitar near the bottom edge, and one on the front of the guitar on the bottom edge. Also has a scuff mark on the back edge. Also has a couple small dent, near the metal plate on the from of the guitar. Please see and study pics carefully. Other than that, the guitar has some light pick/play wear on the front, and some light swirl marks/etc from being moved around on the back. The metal plate piece is in great shape. All in all, the guitar is in good shape, beside what was mentioned. Electronics tested and working. Neck is good and straight, frets are in excellent condition. Great player!
